_comment: LTC6910 - Digitally Controlled Variable Gain Amplifier (VGA) - Family of 3-bit programmable amplifiers
description: LTC6910 Digitally Controlled Variable Gain Amplifier, 3-bit digital control, 11 MHz bandwidth
_comment_G_max: Maximum gain, dB (40 dB = 100 V/V for LTC6910-1 variant)
_comment_G: Typical/nominal gain, dB (20 dB = 10 V/V, typical operating point)
_comment_delta_G: Gain step resolution, dB (discrete steps via 3-bit digital control, 8 steps total)
_comment_BW_VGA: Bandwidth, Hz (11 MHz typical, gain-bandwidth product)
_comment_T_set: Settling time, seconds (1 µs typical for gain changes)
_comment_V_supply_min: Minimum supply voltage, V (single or dual supply operation)
_comment_input_noise: Input voltage noise, V/√Hz (8 nV/√Hz typical, up to 8 nV/√Hz)
_comment_digital_control: 3-bit digital gain control (8 discrete gain steps)
_comment_control_interface: 3-bit digital input (D0, D1, D2 pins) for gain selection
_comment_gain_steps: Number of gain steps (8 steps via 3-bit control: 000 to 111)
_comment_gain_variants: Different gain ranges for LTC6910-1, LTC6910-2, and LTC6910-3 variants
_comment_dynamic_range: Dynamic range, dB (up to 120 dB system dynamic range)
